languages.text: {n}Джай безразлично пожимает плечами.{/n} "Ребята с {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g} — вот моя единственная семья, шерин. Двойняшки-Ловкачи да прочий сброд. Простые в общении, преданные, как собаки... И порой тупые, как навершие изношенного меча".

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай безразлично пожимает плечами.{/n} "Ребята с {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g} — вот моя единственная семья, шерин. Двойняшки-Ловкачи да прочий сброд. Простые в общении, преданные, как собаки... И порой тупые, как навершие изношенного меча".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "The folks on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} are my only family, shereen. The Trickster Twins and the rest of the rabble. Plain-talking and loyal as dogs... And sometimes as dull as the pommel of a worn-out blade."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай безразлично пожимает плечами.{/n} "Ребята с {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g} — вот моя единственная семья, шерин. Двойняшки-Ловкачи да прочий сброд. Простые в общении, преданные, как собаки... И порой тупые, как навершие изношенного меча".

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊不以为然地耸了耸肩。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的那群人是我唯一的家人，亲爱的。骗术师双胞胎和别的下层人，他们说话直截了当，像狗一样忠诚……有时候也像破旧的刀柄一样迟钝。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "The folks on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} are my only family, shereen. The Trickster Twins and the rest of the rabble. Plain-talking and loyal as dogs... And sometimes as dull as the pommel of a worn-out blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊不以为然地耸了耸肩。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的那群人是我唯一的家人，亲爱的。骗术师双胞胎和别的下层人，他们说话直截了当，像狗一样忠诚……有时候也像破旧的刀柄一样迟钝。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "The folks on Footfall are my only family, shereen. The Trickster Twins and the rest of the rabble. Plain-talking and loyal as dogs... And sometimes as dull as the pommel of a worn-out blade."

languages.text: {n}Jae se encoge de hombros con indiferencia.{/n} «La gente de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} es mi única familia, shereen. Los Mellizos Embusteros y el resto de esa escoria. Hablan sin tapujos y son leales como perros... y, a veces, tan cortos como el pomo de un cuchillo».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "The folks on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} are my only family, shereen. The Trickster Twins and the rest of the rabble. Plain-talking and loyal as dogs... And sometimes as dull as the pommel of a worn-out blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se encoge de hombros con indiferencia.{/n} «La gente de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} es mi única familia, shereen. Los Mellizos Embusteros y el resto de esa escoria. Hablan sin tapujos y son leales como perros... y, a veces, tan cortos como el pomo de un cuchillo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは無関心に肩をすくめる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}のみんなが唯一の家族なのよ、シャリーン。トリックスターの双子と、その他大勢の仲間たち。口が達者で犬のように忠実…そして時には、使い古された刃物の柄のように鈍いの」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "The folks on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} are my only family, shereen. The Trickster Twins and the rest of the rabble. Plain-talking and loyal as dogs... And sometimes as dull as the pommel of a worn-out blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは無関心に肩をすくめる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}のみんなが唯一の家族なのよ、シャリーン。トリックスターの双子と、その他大勢の仲間たち。口が達者で犬のように忠実…そして時には、使い古された刃物の柄のように鈍いの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Die Leute auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} sind meine einzige Familie, Shereen. Die Trickster-Zwillinge und das restliche Gesindel. Geradeheraus und treu wie die Hunde ... Und manchmal so stumpf wie der Knauf einer verschlissenen Klinge."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "The folks on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} are my only family, shereen. The Trickster Twins and the rest of the rabble. Plain-talking and loyal as dogs... And sometimes as dull as the pommel of a worn-out blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Die Leute auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} sind meine einzige Familie, Shereen. Die Trickster-Zwillinge und das restliche Gesindel. Geradeheraus und treu wie die Hunde ... Und manchmal so stumpf wie der Knauf einer verschlissenen Klinge."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae hausse les épaules d'un air indifférent.{/n} « Les gens de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} sont ma seule famille, shereen. Les Roublards, les jumeaux je veux dire, et le reste de la vermine. Ils sont francs et aussi fidèles que des chiens... même s'ils ont parfois l'esprit aussi affûté qu'une épée rouillée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "The folks on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} are my only family, shereen. The Trickster Twins and the rest of the rabble. Plain-talking and loyal as dogs... And sometimes as dull as the pommel of a worn-out blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hausse les épaules d'un air indifférent.{/n} « Les gens de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} sont ma seule famille, shereen. Les Roublards, les jumeaux je veux dire, et le reste de la vermine. Ils sont francs et aussi fidèles que des chiens... même s'ils ont parfois l'esprit aussi affûté qu'une épée rouillée. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Tek ailem {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'dakiler{/g} şirinim. Düzenbaz İkizler ile diğer ayaktakımı. Köpek gibi itaatkâr tipler, anca havlarlar. Bazen de göğü kaplayıp yağmur dökemeyen bulutlar gibi insanı boğarlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives an indifferent shrug.{/n} "The folks on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} are my only family, shereen. The Trickster Twins and the rest of the rabble. Plain-talking and loyal as dogs... And sometimes as dull as the pommel of a worn-out blade."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Tek ailem {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'dakiler şirinim. Düzenbaz İkizler ve diğer ayaktakımları. Boş boş konuşan ve köpek gibi itaatkâr tipler. Bazen de kullanıla kullanıla eskimiş bir kılıç kullanmak kadar sıkıcıdırlar da."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
